title: Arugula And Lentil Salad With Goat Cheese
summary: Arugulan And Lentil Salad With Goat Cheese might be just the side dish you are searching for. One serving contains 117 calories, 5g of protein, and 7g of fat. This recipe serves 10. For 91 cents per serving, this recipe covers 7% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 15 people were impressed by this recipe. If you have dijon mustard, cherry tomatoes, coarse salt and pepper, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 30 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegetarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 64%. This score is pretty good. Try Arugula Salad With Goat Cheese, Watermelon And Goat Cheese Arugula Salad, and Goat Cheese and Arugula Pasta Salad for similar recipes.
instructions: Place lentils and 1 onion half in a medium saucepan; cover with cold water by 2 inches. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, partially covered, stirring occasionally, until lentils are tender, about 20 minutes. Drain; discard onion half. Transfer lentils to a medium bowl.

steps.step: Place lentils and 1 onion half in a medium saucepan; cover with cold water by 2 inches. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, partially covered, stirring occasionally, until lentils are tender, about 20 minutes.
Transfer lentils to a medium bowl.
